1.title: Norman Wells, Murmansk, Uummannaq Part I

episode of.title: SF Spezial - Rund um den Polarkreis (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: In Norman Wells, Canada, the pilots of North Wright Air transport everything to the remote settlements of the Sahtu region - from birthday cakes to judges. In Musmansk, Russia, Vassily Pimin is one of the richest men above the Arctic Circle, calling 40 companies and 3500 employees his own. In Uummannaq, Greenland, the children's home of Ann Andreasen tries to connect the tradition of the Inuit children with their future.

2.title: Norman Wells, Murmansk, Uummannaq Part II

episode of.title: SF Spezial - Rund um den Polarkreis (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: In Norman Wells, Canada, a broken oil pipeline threatens the village. In Murmansk, Russia, Oksana Pimina, the wife of oligarch Vasily Pimin, shows off the wealth they have accumulated after the fall of the Soviet Union. In Uummannaq, Greenland, the charges of Ann Andreasen are confronted with the traditional life of their ancestors.

3.title: Norman Wells, Murmansk, Sasyr

episode of.title: SF Spezial - Rund um den Polarkreis (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: 11-year old Christaphor attends school for 9 months in the village Sasyr, Russia, away from his family who lives the traditional life of reindeer nomads in the Siberian taiga. Vasily Pimin in Murmansk, Russia, not only is one of the richest men Murmansk and a tough employer, but also a politician who knows how to make friends with influential people. In Norman Wells, Canada, the owner of North Wright Air enters a crucial partnership with the Dene tribe.

4.title: Klondike, Moma Region, Traena Part I

episode of.title: SF Spezial - Rund um den Polarkreis (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Christaphor travels to his family and his beloved reindeer in the Siberian taiga for the first time after nine months in school. Tony Beets runs one of the largest placer miner operations in the Klondike Fields, Canada. On the Norwegian Traena islands, the northernmost rock festival of the world is about to shake the laid-back fishing community.

5.title: Klondike, Moma Region, Traena Part II

episode of.title: SF Spezial - Rund um den Polarkreis (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Tony Beets in Northern Canada prepares a special gift for college graduation of his youngest daughter. In Siberia, 11-year old Christaphor works the herd of reindeer with his nomad family. The inhabitants of Traena make good use of their time before 3000 rock fans invade the islands, and they recount how this event came about.

6.title: Klondike, Kivalina, Traena

episode of.title: SF Spezial - Rund um den Polarkreis (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Tonys mining operation is running smoothly and he finds some time to play with his grandchildren in the dirt and to enjoy the first gold bar of the season. The Inupiat inhabitants of Kivalina, Alaska, see their traditional way of life endangered by global warming. They haven't caught a whale in 10 years. On Traena in Norway, the festival rocks the peaceful landscape under the midnight sun.

imdb.title: SF Spezial - Rund um den Polarkreis
akas: SF Spezial - Rund um den Polarkreis (Switzerland)
plot: A six-part documentary series, portraying extraordinary people living on and above the Arctic Circle and the magic of a region in constant transition.::Anonymous
